name: The Darkness (itch) (MysticNova)
description:
The Darkness It's something that encompasses you. You surface from it and you fall into it. How will you morph your path shrouded in darkness? Details:
  • 4 endings
  • Estimated Playtime: ~10 minutes

This game contains dark elements, such as detailed descriptions of death, depictions of suicide, and other depressive themes. 

This is my first experience with Twine, so it's all very experimental.  

That being said, I'll take any criticism of my work.

This game may be further developed and updated in the future.
